name: TLC Game BR
summary: TLC Game is coming!, get ready to play!

name: Tlon: A Misty Story
summary: Tlon: A Misty Story is an adventure game released for the PC.

name: Tlicolity Eyes Vol. 3
summary:
Tlicolity Eyes is a part of "triAngle PROJECT," a collaboration project between Otomate and Frontier Works. Each series will have 3 games released in span of 9 months for Windows under the same concept: one heroine, two heroes, and triangle love.

Tlicolity Eyes theme is entertainment industry x love comedy x triangle love.

name: Tlicolity Eyes: Twinkle Showtime
summary:
Nintendo Switch port of the Tlicolity Eyes games.

Tlicolity Eyes is a part of "triAngle PROJECT," a collaboration project between Otomate and Frontier Works. Each series will have 3 games released in span of 9 months for Windows under the same concept: one heroine, two heroes, and triangle love.

Tlicolity Eyes theme is entertainment industry x love comedy x triangle love.

name: Tlatoani
summary: Discover the wonders of the Aztec Civilization as you build your own magnificent metropolis in this ancient city builder adorned with beautiful hand drawn 2D graphics. From humble beginnings rise to build, trade and conquer to become Tlatoani (Emperor).

name: TLO: Casmita
summary: The religious mission of a warrior in a far southwestern country. An adventure game with elements of research, seasoned with combat, dialogues, a well-developed system of impact and interaction with the world. Inspired by the philosophy of nihilism.

name: Tlen Kray
summary: A point-and-click game about a little girl. In this first episode you, together with the main heroine, will have to experience her difficult and dark story.

name: TLL: Tornado Low Level
summary: Flying low you have to take out several targets.
